name: Blaze Out of Space
description:
A strange being that does not belong to this world. Nurtured in the Fragmentum created by the Stellaron, it parasitize upon this world's root structures to obtain energy. Its armor burns with the blazing flames in the core of stars.
In combat, the Blaze Out of Space will incinerate anything it touches.

skills.name: Bellowing Inferno
skills.description: Deals minor Fire DMG to a single target and has a high chance to inflict Enkindle.

skills.name: Blazing Absorption
skills.description: Enters the Spontaneous Combustion state. Rain of Purifying Flames can be used in subsequent attacks.

skills.name: Rain of Purifying Flames
skills.description: Deals successive minor Fire DMG to a random single target, with a high chance to inflict Enkindle.

skills.name: Molten Fusion
skills.description: Gains ATK. This buff is dispelled upon Weakness Break.
